publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-258 Mr Brian Monteith: Harviestoun Brewery Champion Beer of Britain Award 2003-That the Parliament extends its warmest congratulations to Clackmannanshire's Harviestoun Brewery in Dollar after its 'Bitter & Twisted' ale won the prestigious Champion Beer of Britain Award and the Champion Bitter Award at the Great British Beer Festival 2003 held at London Olympia, keeping the title in Scotland for the second year in a row.
S2M-258 Harviestoun Brewery Champion Beer of Britain Award 2003 (lodged on 13 August 2003) Mrs Nanette Milne*
S2M-258 Harviestoun Brewery Champion Beer of Britain Award 2003 (lodged on 13 August 2003) Mr Ted Brocklebank*
S2M-258 Harviestoun Brewery Champion Beer of Britain Award 2003 (lodged on 13 August 2003) Phil Gallie*
S2M-258 Harviestoun Brewery Champion Beer of Britain Award 2003 (lodged on 13 August 2003) Scott Barrie*
S2M-258 Harviestoun Brewery Champion Beer of Britain Award 2003 (lodged on 13 August 2003) Murdo Fraser*

S2M-258 Harviestoun Brewery Champion Beer of Britain Award 2003 (lodged on 13 August 2003) Patrick Harvie*, Lord James Douglas-Hamilton*, Robin Harper*, David Mundell*, Mr Mark Ruskell*, Murray Tosh*, Christine May*, Mike Rumbles*
S2M-258 Harviestoun Brewery Champion Beer of Britain Award 2003 (lodged on 13 August 2003) Bill Aitken*
S2M-258 Harviestoun Brewery Champion Beer of Britain Award 2003 (lodged on 13 August 2003) Eleanor Scott*
S2M-258 Harviestoun Brewery Champion Beer of Britain Award 2003 (lodged on 13 August 2003) John Scott*
